metadata.description: Name of the the environment which is used to generate a short unique hash used in all resources.
Location to deploy the environment resources
Id of the user or app to assign application roles

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('webAppServiceName'))), createObject('value', parameters('webAppServiceName')), createObject('value', format('{0}webapp-{1}', variables('abbrs').webSitesAppService, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure App Service in an existing Azure App Service plan.

appSettings.value: [union(parameters('appSettings'), createObject('SCM_DO_BUILD_DURING_DEPLOYMENT', string(parameters('scmDoBuildDuringDeployment')), 'ENABLE_ORYX_BUILD', string(parameters('enableOryxBuild'))), if(and(equals(parameters('runtimeName'), 'python'), equals(parameters('appCommandLine'), '')), createObject('PYTHON_ENABLE_GUNICORN_MULTIWORKERS', 'true'), createObject()), if(not(empty(parameters('applicationInsightsName'))), createObject('APPLICATIONINSIGHTS_CONNECTION_STRING', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Insights/components', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), '2020-02-02').ConnectionString), createObject()), if(not(empty(parameters('keyVaultName'))), createObject('AZURE_KEY_VAULT_ENDPOINT', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.KeyVault/vaults', parameters('keyVaultName')), '2022-07-01').vaultUri), createObject()))]

metadata.description: Updates app settings for an Azure App Service.
The name of the app service resource within the current resource group scope
The app settings to be applied to the app service
Assigns an Azure Key Vault access policy.
Creates an Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL account with a database.

resources.name: [format('{0}/{1}/{2}', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[1], parameters('containers')[copyIndex()].name)]
dependsOn: [resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlDatabases', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[1])]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure Cosmos DB for NoSQL account.
Creates an Azure Cosmos DB account.

resources.name: cosmos-sql-role-definition

metadata.description: Creates a SQL role definition under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

dependsOn: [resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlDatabases', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[1])]

resources.name: [format('cosmos-sql-user-role-{0}', uniqueString(parameters('principalIds')[copyIndex()]))]

metadata.description: Creates a SQL role assignment under an Azure Cosmos DB account.

dependsOn: [resourceId('Microsoft.DocumentDB/databaseAccounts/sqlDatabases', split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[0], split(format('{0}/{1}', parameters('accountName'), parameters('databaseName')), '/')[1])]

metadata.description: OpenAI deployments to create.
Creates an Azure Cognitive Services instance.
The custom subdomain name used to access the API. Defaults to the value of the name parameter.

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('appServicePlanName'))), createObject('value', parameters('appServicePlanName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').webServerFarms, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure App Service plan.

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('keyVaultName'))), createObject('value', parameters('keyVaultName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').keyVaultVaults, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.description: Creates an Azure Key Vault.

properties.accessPolicies: [if(not(empty(parameters('principalId'))), createArray(createObject('objectId', parameters('principalId'), 'permissions', createObject('secrets', createArray('get', 'list')), 'tenantId', subscription().tenantId)), createArray())]

parameters.applicationInsightsName: [if(not(empty(parameters('applicationInsightsName'))), createObject('value', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').insightsComponents, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.description: Creates an Application Insights instance and a Log Analytics workspace.
Creates a Log Analytics workspace.
Creates an Application Insights instance based on an existing Log Analytics workspace.
Creates a dashboard for an Application Insights instance.

chart.title: Average processor and process CPU utilization
